data.name: Easy Red 2: Stalingrad
data.detailed_description:
The Volga River is not lost yet! Come on comrades!
With Easy Red 2: Stalingrad you will expand the front to the East for the first time, in the heart of the Soviet Union.

With this expansion a lot of new contents are added inside Easy Red 2, including:
• New weapons, such as the PPSH41, Mosin 91/30 & M28, SVT-40, DP28, PTRD-41, TT Tokarev, RGD-33 grenades and more.
• New vehicles including T34 & T34-85, KV1 & KV2, Zis-3 cannon, Zis troop & AA truck, Maxim MG standard & AA, Katyusha, BA-11 , the BT-7, the SU-76, the IL-2, the BF-110 steam boats and others.
• New uniforms and accessories for the Russian army.
• New voiceovers for the Russian army.
• New props, items and buildings for the Mission Editor.
• The new 'Stalingrad' map with various missions.

The campaign will run between late 1942 and early 1943, and will include battles including crossing the Volga River, battles within the destroyed city, and armored battles in the city's suburbs and surrounding countryside.

In addition, the DLC, just like the base game, will be subject to updates and improvements that may also include new weapons, vehicles, uniforms and missions in the future!

data.short_description: The Volga River is not lost yet! Come on comrades! With Easy Red 2: Stalingrad you will expand the front to the East for the first time, in the heart of the Soviet Union with new weapons, vehicles, uniforms and missions!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G530 / AMD Athlon II X2 250
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT710 / AMD Radeon R5 240
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1 GB of VRAM required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 360
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 2 GB of VRAM required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G530 or AMD Athlon II X2 250
  • Memory: 2500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1 GB of VRAM required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 360
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 2 GB of VRAM required

data.legal_notice:
Intellectual property belong to Amadei Marco (Developer)
Easy Red 2 is licensed for personal use. It is strictly forbidden to sell or distribute the software without the consent of Corvostudio.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains simulated war scenarios. Effects such as blood however can be disabled.
